subject: feat: add custom graph colors for embedded charts
body:
Allow embedding apps to customize chart colors via URL parameters:
- ?palette=warm (6 named presets: default, warm, cool, earth, vibrant, mono)
- ?colors=hex1,hex2 (custom series for multi-dataset charts)
- ?accent=hex (primary color for single-dataset charts and heatmaps)
- ?muted=hex (secondary color for after-hours/weekend bars)

Created centralized chartColors.js module that parses URL params at load
time and exports resolved colors. All 5 chart tab components now import
from this module instead of hardcoding hex values. Heatmap CSS uses
--chart-accent-rgb CSS variable set from the resolved accent color.

Tag distribution colors remain semantic (not overridden by custom colors).
